text:
Hi friends! Hoping you can help me: I'm trying to add a Stripe buy button to my HubSpot site (free version). HubSpot payments is not available in Finland yet, so going with Stripe.

I add the code (first screenshot), save and exit but no button appears and when I go back there's only a couple of lines of the code left (second screenshot). From Stripe's side everything should be fine, it's a straight copy-paste.

Any help is much appreciated!

The editor makes some cleaning for tags.

Same in Finnish but a bit longer:
Toi Hubbarin editori siivoaa pois koodista kaikki tuollaiset ei-standardia olevat tägit eli `<stripe-buy-button>` . Tohon ei välttämättä saa laitettua suoraan kaikkea juuri tuossa muodossa.

Tuon voi kiertää kahdella tavalla:
1. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/design-manager/create-and-edit-modules|Custom modulella>
2. Laittamalla nappulan Google Tag Managerin kautta
Another option is to create Stripe link instead of buy button. That can be done here: <https://dashboard.stripe.com/payment-links/create>
